desc: USDOT and US Department of Transportation vehicle decals, vinyl graphics, stickers, and magnetic signs from $2.50 with fast and free shipping. Our US DOT registration numbers are produced using durable vinyl lettering that is made in the USA. 100% US DOT compliant. Orders placed before 2 PM (eastern) M-F ship same day.

layout.text: YOUR ONE-STOP SHOP FOR USDOT STICKERS AND MAGNETIC SIGNS FOR IDENTIFICATION OF TRACTOR TRAILERS, SEMIS, AND OTHER COMMERCIAL VEHICLES USED THROUGHOUT THE TRANSPORTATION AND LOGISTICS INDUSTRY.
